name: Sokoban Reimagined
description:
A simple Sokoban clone game I made a few years ago. Found it on my dropbox and decided to share!

CONTROLS
PC: use the mouse to select stage and keyboard to move the character.
Mobile: tap to select stage and on screen arrow buttons to move the character (or swipe).

  • Sokoban art by 1001.com (https://opengameart.org/content/sokoban-pack)
  • Numbers and letters by GameArtForge (https://opengameart.org/content/numbers-blocks-set-01)
  • Keyboard buttons by PR (https://opengameart.org/content/game-ui-simple-outline-squares)
